QuestData.Title: Save a Slyvern
QuestData.Description:
Now that she's healed, I think Sylvie wants to show us something.
Our work isn't done yet, $n! Let's see what's upsetting her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find out what Sylvie is upset about.
QuestData.RewardText:
It's faint, but I can hear what sounds like kits in the cave!
This is bad...
